phrases: I have come home.
Yes.
It all starts here.
You are right.
Demon territory.
They deliberately let the Chaos run rampant on this island.
That way, settlements get fragmented, and it is hard for people to band together.
That type of ruling would never be allowed.
I feel the same way.
That is why I am here.
So what is the next step?
Let us go to the town of Laxia.
That is Rossini's territory.
If we go there, would not they know that we have arrived?
That is exactly what we want.
Phederico Rossini must have heard by now that you have declared to come to Sistina.
We will actually use the Rossini family
to spread the word all over Sistina that the hero, Theo Cornaro, has returned.
To overthrow the Rossini family, it is imperative that the people rise up.
To make that happen, we will start by having you openly announce yourself in Laxia.
They will reach out to every town on the island to apprehend you.
And so, they will spread the word for us that someone opposed to the Rossinis has arrived.
I had no idea it was thriving this much.
Irvin and Priscilla, I would like you to go procure our supplies.
- Understood.
-Very well.
Lady Siluca, why do not you and the others go eat?
Good idea.
We need to be conspicuous.
Jana, you truly are gorgeous.
Am I?
It is her!
You wretched...
Who are they?
Just some people I met before.
You know, they really made me suffer.
If those three are your enemy, I suppose I cannot look the other way.
My name is Salvador Rossini.
You can go ahead and tell me your name.
I am Theo Cornaro.
What?
I see, so it is you.
I have heard about you.
That there is someone reckless enough to try to revolt against the Rossini family in Sistina.
Rossini.
Mark my words, I will defeat you, and liberate the people of this island!
I would like to see you try.
This island is and will be ours, for all eternity!
In the name of the Rossini family, I order you to swear a blood oath of fealty!
- We have to run. - Why?
Those who gather around the Omerta Flag become ruthless.
They will carry out the most cruel act without any remorse.
Then all we have to do is massacre them all.
I do not want to drag the townsfolk into this.
Flash!
- What was that? - Hey!
Damn it.
How could you leave us behind!
We had a hard time finding you!
Sorry.
There is a search party patrolling the town.
There seems to be an Artist among them, too.
That is right, one of Rossini's Artists was that assassin who gave you trouble.
That was a blunder on my part.
But still, what is that Black Witch from the Forest of Eternal Darkness doing on this island?
People with baggage flee to this island, where they become the Rossini family's guest.
It happens all the time.
Either way, I think we have met our goal of spreading the word of your return.
Almost too effectively, huh?
Yes.
All right, here is the next step.
Let us tour the neighboring villages, and call on the people to revolt.
Cornaro my foot, that wannabe hero!
Hey, Dad, let me take care of him.
I will get rid of him for sure!
Fine.
That is what I like to hear!
I will bring you back Theo's head in no time!
Slow down, Salvador.
It would be better to gather the proper amount of troops first.
You like to play it safe, Brother.
Do not forget, Salvador.
Execute extreme caution, and act boldly.
That is the Rossini way.
I know that.
Take down the Rossinis?
Impossible.
You would best leave this island while you are still alive.
I know that it will not be easy.
But I cannot just leave.
How many of you are here?
Did you bring along a large force?
No, these are the only comrades I brought.
I would like the people of Sistina to rise up.
Then it is all the more impossible.
You people can do whatever you want.
But we have no intention of helping you.
But why?
Do not you all abhor the Rossini family?
Everyone who is resisted has been killed.
Rather than stand up to them, it is better to get on the Rossini's good side.
There are a lot of people who feel that way, even in this village.
You better watch out so nobody snitches on you.
What is the matter with them?
Do they want things to stay the way they are?
I would heard that Sistina was ruled with fear and despair, but this...
People who swear a blood oath of fealty to the Rossinis
are given the right to plunder, under the guise of collecting taxes.
So some try to become plunderers to curry favor.
Unbelievable.
It is been like this ever since.
Those who plunder, and those who get plundered.
They turn their citizens against each other,
and take their cut without ever soiling their own hands.
I am starting to realize how hard it is going to be to defeat the Rossini family.
Two hundred?
Is not that number too low for troops?
I have not heard about any huge forces arriving on the island.
This will be more than enough.
The other side has brought a skilled Shadow.
Please do not let your guard down.
You mean the one you failed to kill in Jalucia?
All right, let us see you take him out.
I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself.
Salvador!
I will be away from the mansion for a while.
I want you to wait for me.
Please.
Make sure you kill those two.
I will make your wish come true.
Seriously, I have a good idea where
Theo's bound to show up.
You are wonderful!
You cannot be too careful.
Boltz.
What is it, sir?
Go send a warning to the people.
Show them what will happen if they side with the enemy.
Get out of this village!
J-Just because they suspected us of sheltering you,
they burned down the village to the north!
So many people have lost their homes!
Wait a second!
It is not Sir Theo you should be blaming, but the Rossinis, who committed this outrage.
Nobody wants you to bring down the Rossini family!
Just get out of this village already!
I hope they kill you all!
- You are making trouble for us!
- Leave!
Is not there anyone at all on this island who will take Sir Theo's side?
What should we do?
Would not it be useless if we go to the next village?
What about the village where Sir Theo was born?
All right.
Let us head over.
Since I want you to see the village where I was born, too.
Let me pass.
Please, think it over!
I understand how you feel.
The villagers did a terrible thing to your father.
But they had to, or...
Are you telling me they had no choice?
I have lost all hope for this village, and for Sistina.
Everybody's under Rossini's thumb, and they do not even feel bitter about it.
Theo.
Goodbye, Rebecca.
Theo!
Rebecca?
Long time no see.
Yeah.
Could you gather everyone in the village?
I want to talk to them.
I never thought you would return.
Neither did I.
Back then, I could not bring myself to forgive you all.
That is why I left the village.
Um, what happened, exactly?
To elude the Rossini's plundering, Theo's father built a secret grain storehouse.
Whenever food became scarce in the village, he would distribute it in secret.
But then someone in the village snitched on him.
They arrived here in droves, and his father was handed over to them.
And he was killed to set an example.
I have put that behind me now.
My father must have known it could happen.
You are a fine man, Theo.
And so was your father.
I am just doing as I see fit.
The rest of you just need to think about what it is you really want.
To continue living in fear of the Rossini family?
Or to put an end to that way of living?
That is all I have to say.
Let us go.
All right.
Wait!
Rebecca.
Since it is been a while, why do not you visit your father's grave?
I suppose.
I will go with you.
Sure.
Sir Theo?
Can you wait for me here?
I will be right back.
Understood.
You have really made something of yourself.
I would not say that.
Hey, do you remember?
That day you left the village?
Yeah.
It is amazing that you went on to become a Lord.
No, actually, I always knew that you were different from the other boys.
You will find a way to defeat him.
I am certain of it!
What did the Rossinis tell you?
Wh-What are you talking about?
Tell me honestly.
So you knew.
- Yeah. - Then why did you come?
If I ran, who knew what would have happened to the village.
And they might have been threatening you.
Are you saying you did it for the village?
No one's threatening me.
It is the opposite.
If I managed to lure you, I made them promise to take me to the city.
The Rossinis, that is.
Is that what you wanted?
That is right.
Because it would be better than living here.
Rebecca, tell me the truth.
What do you care?
It does not concern you anymore.
You left this village!
I am sorry.
Back then, I just could not forgive the villagers.
Because I thought it was their fault my father died.
But not anymore.
It is the Rossini family who I should hate for ruling this way.
If the citizens all rise up, we can defeat the Rossinis.
I came back here so I could make an appeal to do that.
That is never going to happen.
You know, right?
On this island, no one survives if you stand up to the Rossinis.
- You are wrong about that! - I am not wrong!
And besides,
Theo, they are going to kill you.
That might be true.
Still...
Rebecca, I want you to go back and tell everyone to flee the village.
Even if they hand me over, the Rossinis will probably make an example of this village.
They cannot do such a...
Where are you going?
They are all waiting for me at Father's grave, right?
That day, I ran away from the village.
But I am not running this time.
How are you going to fight them alone?
There is a lot of soldiers!
No way.
You are telling us that Theo knowingly went along with Rebecca?
Why would he do something like that?
Had Sir
Theo turned her down, there is no telling what they would have done to that girl.
And this village would have come under attack as well.
He did it to protect us.
- Why would he do that?
- Why...
Because that is what a true Lord is.
If you see the Rossini family as your Lord, then go ahead and leave Sir Theo to his fate.
However, if you want to save Sir Theo, then take up your arms, and make a stand.
Everybody!
Please help
Theo!
Listen, unless we do something, it will be just like last time!
You remember what happened after we turned Theo's father over to them, right?
Far from rewarding us for our help, they hit us with heavy taxes as punishment!
So will we turn in Theo this time?
Will the same thing happen all over again?
Do we really want to live like this forever?
Lady Siluca instructed me to come.
Irvin.
That man is the Shadow I mentioned.
He may be a footman, but he is quite formidable.
They may be highly skilled, but how much will it help to have three more on his side?
I am hearing footsteps.
What?
Wh-What are they doing?
Sir Theo!
Everybody decided to make a stand!
Rebecca.
No way!
The people of this island would never revolt against the Rossini family!
Everyone...
Thank you.
Let us begin the battle to bring an end to the Rossini family's rule!
You mere villagers should not get full of yourselves!
Let them find out what happens to anyone who betrays the Rossini family!
Go!
Irvin!
Rise!
Protect Sir Salvador!
Wait!
Rebecca.
G-Get out of my way!
Rebecca!
Stop it!
D-Damn you!
Rebecca!
Get off me!
Salvador Rossini!
S-Sir Salvador...
Retreat!
We are withdrawing!
Withdraw!
Rebecca.
Theo...
I am sorry.
Sir Theo.
She put her life on the line to stop Salvador.
Allowing Salvador Rossini to get away would have been the same as losing this battle.
Rebecca...
I wanted you to find happiness.
TO THE HOMELAND
EPISODE 14 THE LIBERATOR OF SISTINA
